snippet: Honda said on Monday that it was setting up separate Honda and Acura divisions in the United States, with dedicated sales and marketing teams for each brand.
abstract: Honda says it is setting up separate Honda and Acura divisions in the United States, with dedicated sales and marketing teams for each brand.
lead_paragraph: Honda said on Monday that it was setting up separate Honda and Acura divisions in the United States, with dedicated sales and marketing teams for each brand.

headline.main: Honda and Acura Will Have Separate Divisions in U.S.
